devdoc.author: Carson Case (carsonpcase@gmail.com)
devdoc.details: Router contract to create Order contracts that allow users to pay using only a simple eth TX. The Order contract calls back to emmit events signififying order completion

issueRefund(address,uint256).details: issueRefund contract to refund a user a certain amount

newOrder(uint256).details: newOrder function to create an order contract at a certain ETH price. Emits event on creation

params._price: in ETH to require a user pays before completion

onPaymentCallback(uint256).details: onPaymentCallback to handle when a payment is made. This way the backend/frontend only needs to listen to   this router instead of each and every Order contract created

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

takeFunds(uint256).details: takeFunds for owner to take funds out of the Router if acting as treasury

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: Router
